task.summary: It's somewhat working, but needs LOADS of polishing
Getting closer to a running app
Now we're getting somewhere. I hope. I miss iOS development.
One small commit before a huge new attempt
HUGE improvements. More soon, just have to commit before trying something cool 😎
AND THERE WE GO! A fully functioning tab bar navigation system 🥳🥳🥳
Refactoring to follow more best practises
Restored PlaybackActivity to its former glory
Some work on the search feature
Added logic for the famous playback bar
Some progress on parsing. Not much to report for now.
Featured podcasts are now displayed in Search 🥳 Hint: it's placholder data for now
Refactoring: moved adapters to its own package
Initial work on passing data from fragment to fragment using Navigation
More great improvements to the login/register process 😎
The playback UI is now modularized and looks much better
Just some more improvements, that's all
Initial support for viewing featured podcasts from the iTunes API! YAY!
Getting top podcasts now comes with the podcast's cover art 🥳
